review_title: Good set of lip balms for a decent price
reviews:
Great selection of lip balms. Each lip balm has it's own unique outlying feature.

Melon: Easily the best tasting one but seems like the weakest for me. I also found it brittle
Lemon: Tastes good and decently refreshing, bit acidic as expected and works well
Mint: Great refreshing feeling and the taste is good
Hemp: The most generic one, it's great if you don't want any flavor and works quite well

I have to put them on multiple times throughout the day. Living in Toronto, lip balms are a must have but I wish these were a bit stronger. I would purchase again. For now, it's a 4/5 but I'll update in a couple weeks to see if they're good long-term

review_title: Works perfect for a '06 CRV
reviews:
Works well as expected.

Installation was Easy peasy.

review_title: Good rugged speaker
reviews: Great look on this rugged speaker. I purchased this for a friend. Output on the sound is pretty good and the battery lasts a good amount and only have to charge it once a week. Purchased for about $35 so it was a good deal. Otherwise the item is as described.

review_title: Great mount and easy to install
reviews: Excellent mount, very easy to install in my room. Recommend mounting with a friend. No creaking noises and the extension is very smooth. I have a pretty heavy old Samsung TV which is still under the recommended weight and I've had no issues. The arm extends out fully and can be retracted fully.

review_title: Good as a short-term solution
reviews:
It's okay so there isn't much to say. The product is as described but there's a significant speed difference. Range is a bit better than before. We placed the router in the top floor because that's the only place with an Ethernet plugin. Our main floor and basement had poor range so we invested in this. Made the range a bit better and so nothing else to expect from this product.

If you have slow internet and range issues then make sure you isolate your issue before blaming this product. Your router or internet plan may be the issue.

review_title: Good for people on a low budget
reviews:
Does it's job. Quality isn't very high so you get what you pay for.

I used it for India and UAE.

review_title: Excellent wireless keyboard, great for your TV
reviews:
Great keyboard for your TV. Purchased on sale for about $25 and there is no competition in the price. The keyboard makes it extremely easy to navigate on your TV with the dedicated yellow-click button on the top left side of the keyboard. You can give this keyboard to anyone and they'll have a great time using it. Your mom, your kid and even yourself.

I wish the touchpad was not so sensitive to water. Any moisture on your hands will make it impossible to use the touchpad but that isn't a huge issue (you shouldn't use wet hands on tech anyways). The arrow keys are very narrow, sometimes a pain to use. No real issues otherwise.

Has great range, slim form factor, keys are mushy with low travel and the volume controls above the touchpad is great placement. I love that the function keys are secondary so I can use media keys (for Spotify) on demand. I would love to purchase a similar higher quality product from Logitech in the future.

review_title: Good for bass lovers on a budget
reviews: Too much distortion at max volume. Very punchy bass which is great but for 20W speakers it should go louder.

review_title: Good plain and simple hat
reviews: Soft fabric that keeps my head super warm. No complaints.

review_title: Excellent for posters
reviews: Works great. Used 4 pcs per poster with no sag/ drag. Have used it for about 2 months and still going strong.

review_title: Excellent
reviews: Purchased this for a friend. Excellent case, very light-weight and low-profile. Feels great in the hand

review_title: Excellent speaker and a joy to use everyday
reviews:
Excellent speaker and the simplistic design make it one of the best speakers to buy for the price.

Pros:
- With dual 6W speakers the sound is great for filling up a medium to large room
- I listen to a lot of bass heavy music, quite a bit of rap and RnB so the speakers handles those types of songs very well
- Water resistant so its a bonus for taking it on the go and not worrying about rain/ splashes
- No distortion whatsoever at full volume, other speakers in this price range suffer but this one has no problems
- Pretty easy to carry around, kind of awkward shape for a bag but it still is small enough to carry in a slim backpack
- Design is one of the best parts of this speaker, I use it both flat and horizontally and thats just a bonus that Oontz have thought of. Easy to carry in the hand with plenty of grip. Buttons are easy to press and tactile. Two LED's one for power and another for bluetooth pairing. I always use bluetooth so I have not tested the AUX input
- Battery is amazing, I honestly don't really worry about charging it and I haven't seen any warnings yet

Cons:
- Although the speaker is waterproof and everything, the sound outside is a lot weaker than I would've liked it to be. The sound is lacking in a basketball court or a gym which was one of my intended use cases.
- The rubber sides catch dust very easily, not a huge deal/

So a LOT of benefits to the speaker and the cons are almost non-existent depending on your use-case.

No complaints. I would love to try out the Oontz Angle 3XL someday. I think it is a better fit for me but quite pricey.

review_title: Bad experience with using it but has potential
reviews:
Okay, so I'm not sure if I either have bad luck with meidong purchases or all their products are just not that great. I first purchased the qqChocolate speaker from them which was a dual 5W speaker. It had some minor problems which were super annoying which I don't think is prevalent across all their speakers so I left a 1 star review and requested a return for it. They're sending me a new one so I will test it.

I ordered this dual 6W speaker with hopes that it would do the job. I don't want to bash the company and talk about negatives so I'll talk about the good parts first:
- Very loud, gets quite a bit louder than the 5W meidong speaker I had before
- Nice material choice, the metal makes it look and feel premium
- Very sturdy as well, as in it is strong
- Filling sound, better room filling output than the other meidong speaker and better than the Oontz Angle 3 plus (dual 6W as well)
- Controls work well, power indicator and sound helps with pairing the device and letting you know when it is connected
- Overall, pretty good speaker for the price which I got with lightning deal for CAD $33.99

Now I have to talk about some glaring bad points which directly affects the performance of the speaker:
- MAJOR design flaw where if you are playing sound at full volume, the entire speaker shakes. It shakes so much that sometimes it flips itself over. Now I don't know if my speaker has a weak rubber base or it's a product issue for all speakers but it's not usable. I can't keep it on a table because the speaker will move around and fall off if I play at full volume.
- There is noticeable distortion at full volume, especially noticeable when you compare to other speakers.
- When I listen to 3005 by Childish Gambino at a certain volume, some parts of the songs don't play. It is very noticeable and takes away from the music experience. I've tested my phone with other speakers and this issue doesn't exist with. The meidong qqChocolate works fine with this song.

This product has potential. I either have a faulty product or meidong needs to come out with a version 2 of this product with minor fixes.

review_title: Great backpack for students and professionals
reviews:
Great slim backpack for school. Provides a clean minimal look and good for carrying the must haves. I love that it has multiple pockets on the inside. I carry my Surface (with charger), a couple notebooks, a bottle of water and my bluetooth speakers in the main compartment. I have an assortment of cables, travel charger and pen/ pencils in the front and secondary compartment. With all these things the bag is FULL, it doesn't bulge so it is perfect for me. The bag is also very sturdy, many people don't talk about this. While the bag is full, it stands up straight and doesn't fall over.

I wish the product would stretch out a bit more to allow additional space. The bag holds 18L, I wish the company made a larger version with 21L with the same design. 5/5 stars regardless.

review_title: Excellent cables, the way to go for the best value
reviews: Great product and fair pricing. Cables are not something you want to replace often to paying a couple bucks more for a no nonsense charging solution is the way to go. Anker is a great company is and these cables get the job done. Quality seems great and I don't see and weak-points. Good selection of cables in the 6-pack. I will update the review if at any time the cables fail.

review_title: One of my favourite products ever
reviews: One of the best value purchases you can make. As a student it makes my life super convenient. Awesome for storage too. 10 to 15 minute assembly by myself. Avoid Ikea and get this of you want something short-term with good space management

review_title: Excellent graphic card
reviews: Purchased the superclocked card. This was my first graphics card purchase as a new PC builder. Excellent for mid range gaming. Runs GTA 5 smoothly. No issues at all.

review_title: Not the most reliable speaker
reviews:
Works excellently when it works. Sound quality for the size is amazing. I take it with me to an indoor basketball court and it does a good job of providing good background sound. Excellent for filling a medium to large room as well. No distortion at all.

Biggest issue with the device is that the sound stutters. The play/ pause doesn't always work either. The bottom rubber keeps coming off. Would've given 5 stars if the product worked properly.

review_title: Good microsd card with good performance
reviews: Works well with the Samsung Galaxy J7.

review_title: Ok wireless headphones
reviews: I like it but it gets dirty really easily. Audio is ok, the battery drains really fast now.

review_title: Great moisturizing lotion for dry skin
reviews: Excellent, works well with my dry skin. Use it for body and plenty in the bottle for months. Coupon also included to save $2 from the next purchase.

review_title: Can't recommend
reviews: Broke within 2 months of usage. Purchased for my sister and she did not like it. First the buttons stopped working then the left side stopped working.

review_title: Great looking and feeling case
reviews: One of the best J7 cases out there. Really go for it if you have a gold phone. Flaps at the bottom are a bit annoying but it's great if you live in a dusty place.

review_title: Works well
reviews: Good product, easy to apply. Purchased for my dad and he has no complaints.

review_title: Awesome case, one of the best ITX cases on the market
reviews:
I returned this case only because I DECIDED to go with a larger MicroATX case after I received it.

This case is excellent however. I didn't have the chance to build in it but it sure looks and feels amazing. I would say it would be challenging for a first time builder but still don't shy away from it if you really want an ITX. I initially wanted a really portable computer but decided to go with the Fractal Design Define Mini C because it better met my needs and was a nicer setup to show off. This case is the best for on the go users and very compact without compromising utility and function.

review_title: Good Tea Maker
reviews: Really convenient and nice to have especially if you drink tea everyday. Easy to clean and retains heat nicely as well. Drips tea when moving it around, I rarely have to do it but it does occur. I don't think this is a big issue though, just a mention.

review_title: Would recommend for student or a simplistic look
reviews: Decent quality curtain, basic and fair for the price

review_title: Had troubles with the adhesive so my experience was not great
reviews: Couldn't use it after 2 months after use. Just sits on my desk now. I don't know if I could recommend this product because I had troubles with adhesive.

review_title: 100% recommend
reviews: Best mouse purchase ever. Works really well and works great even after half a year. Very easy to clean and use.

review_title: Looks and works great
reviews: Excellent case. Was a present for my mom and she loved it.

review_title: Works great after 1 year
reviews: Excellent product. Really effective charging replacement.

review_title: Would recommend and would buy again
reviews: Not too harsh on the skin. My skin looks noticeably cleaner as a guy and has reduced acne.

review_title: Great solution to create a unique look
reviews:
Thing's I like:
- Good color output, very pleasing to look at behind my desk
- Easy to get it to set it up out of the box, pretty clear instructions on what to do
- Remote is actually functional, everything works as it should with a good set of options
- Initially set it up cause it look's really nice, but it's also helped me reduce eye strain when working on projects late at night

Thing's I Don't Like:
- Not accurate color's, sure they're nice but could be more accurate
- The power brick is way to bulky IMO, it was kinda a mission to hide it behind my desk

Comments:
- Excellent to use behind your desk, I didn't use their adhesive though so I can't comment on that
- All-round good product and a definite recommend

review_title: It's okay, not good for weighing light items
reviews: It does what the product description says. Wish it was more accurate.

review_title: Great product, easy to use
reviews: Works quite well, easy to use in my 03 Civic. Quality is quite good in Bluetooth and even better with an Aux cord. There is some static that comes up when driving around in Toronto sometimes. Worst part is probably the Asian lady saying words when the transmitter starts and also when a device is connected by Bluetooth or Aux cord. I kinda got used to it but it often startles people when they get into my car for the first time.

review_title: Good for cheap racquets
reviews: Works well with my old cheap racquets that I have laying just in case there is an impromptu tennis game with friends, they enjoy it. The instructions aren't very clear and the glue sides aren't labelled well. Product itself is quite nice for a cheap grip. I wouldn't recommend it if you're a serious player.

review_title: Good value product
reviews: Decent Aux cord, use it to connect my phone to a FM Transmitter. Very thin wire cable but doesn't feel fragile so it moves around when my phone is connected.

review_title: They're good if you wanna set up audio through headphones
reviews: These aren't the highest quality cables I've used but they get the job done.

review_title: Good value and product acceptable quality
reviews: Purchased this for my sister. She was quite please with it. It gets the job done and has decent quality.

review_title: Awesome set of products but bad quality
reviews:
Great package. I honestly charge my phone from different locations so this set works great.

I use the smallest cable to charge from my power bank and for travel.

The medium cable is great for charging from my desk so I have some maneuverability. Broke one of these.

The long cable I use when I'm charging from my bed which is really great. Honestly I ended up breaking both long cables because I dropped my phones multiple times and it ended up bending because of the bad quality. I actually have been using the product for over 6 months but half the products broke.

review_title: Good product, not really good for charging your phone (S5/ Note 3)
reviews: Speedwise it's great. I'm not exactly sure what the actual numbers are but compared to other cables its good and definitely faster than USB 2.0. Only gripe is that the plastic casing that protects the wire is too sturdy and hard to move it in the direction you want it to go.

review_title: Good buy
reviews: Really good eraser. It erases very well but has a lot of flex to it, wish it was a bit sturdier.

review_title: Good value and does what it is supposed to
reviews: It's cheap. I'm a student and moved into a new place where I had to share the bathroom with my roomates. Wanted a relatively cheap mat of decent quality for the bathroom and this worked really well. Never smelt bad or anything and no color deformation. Probably gonna buy this again next year when I move again.

review_title: Best alternate way to charge your phone
reviews:
This isn't just a great product. It is probably the greatest experience I've had with a product I purchased from Amazon. Anker really came through with this product and it truly is amazing. I've been using it for about 2 weeks and with no fail it has been a pleasure to use.

I really do hope that more people get on this product because it is amazing. The charging port on my S5 stopped working so this thing rescued me.

Honestly, Anker is a great company. I've owned their portable power banks for a few years now and those were amazing. I also recently purchased earphones for my sister and she is super happy with it. Props to Anker for being awesome and making great products.

review_title: They are really good
reviews: I like the metal casing on the pencils. They last a good while. Would buy again.

review_title: Excellent product, well made
reviews: Works as advertised. No issues with the cable. Would purchase the same product or from the company again. I use it with my Surface Pro 3 and change the scaling.

review_title: Good for the price, look elsewhere for better quality
reviews: Honestly use only 2 of the 4 in the set but the price was good so I can't complain. The quality itself is okay, kinda fidgety when attaching to a tie but stays in place most of the time.

review_title: Good quality binoculars
reviews: Excellent quality binoculars, visually. I wish there was a way to change the focus on the binoculars.

review_title: Wouldn't recommend these headphones, broke very easily
reviews:
I received the headphones in the mail only two days after purchase so the delivery aspect of the transaction was really quick.

Initially I thought the volume control would change the phone volume but it controls the headphone volume only, this could be a con for some people using their earphones with their phones but I am getting just used to it so it isn't that bad. The pause button works perfectly with my Galaxy S5 so I'll say that it would probably work with other android phones as well. Double press to skip a track and triple press to go back to a track also works too.

Sound from the earphones is really good, I listen to a lot of rap and hip hop so these headphones aren't really meant for that but the bass is good and they have a surround sound feel, definitely would recommend it to people that listen to that type of music. I did try listening to some EDM and the songs with really heavy bass sound fantastic. I tested the microphone from the earphones vs the phone microphone, the earphone microphone delivers better quality sound and it sound's more realistic but it doesn't sound very loud while the phone was much louder but wasn't crisp sounding.

The cable length is excellent it's really long and also comes with a shirt clip, it is also a flat cable so it doesn't get tangled as much as regular cables when you take it out of your pocket so there is nothing lacking from the experience there. The flat cable is covered with colored plastic that looks and feel kinda cheap but I don't have a huge problem with it since I only paid $40 for this pair.

The earphones come with 4 pairs of ear tips ranging from small, medium, large and a double flange ear tip. Normally I would use either small or medium ear tips but the included double flange ear tip fits perfectly in my ear and even delivers better sound because of it. One issue that came up with the double flange is that it opens up outwards when I remove it from my ears almost 1/10th of the time, not a big deal but it does happen. The color on the earphones I purchased is also faded in some places but it isn't noticeable it you don't go out of your way to look for discoloration. The earphones also comes with a wrist band which I don't care much about, and a carrying case which is nice but I wouldn't really use it and would just carry my earphones around in my pocket.

Only real con for me is the design of the housing case because it is so big, they stay in the ear properly and don't really weigh much but still seem really big when I look at myself in the mirror. Another issue is that the inside of my ears become uncomfortable after a long time of listen, I tried them for 2 hours and the problem started.

Design: 0
Build quality: 0
Sound quality: 4
Comfort: 2
Satisfaction: 1

Update: Like I said before, the housing of the earphones are extremely large and there is only a small spacing of plastic between two parts of the housing which makes it extremely fragile. Today while taking the earphone out of my bag it got caught into a seem and the housing broke. They don't work anymore after 2 months. Quality was okay but I would never buy these again.

review_title: It just looks good
reviews: Its pretty good, best aspect of the app over stock the that it looks much better but that is it. I feel like a full widget with the ability to select music would be much better and more functional. Still using it over stock app though which is a plus, also I got the app for free and I would not have paid money for this app.
